tldr: Affected versions of this package use a regular expression with inefficient complexity in the HTML tokenizer, specifically within the `_run_span_gamut` function. This inefficiency can be exploited with specially crafted input to trigger excessive CPU usage, resulting in degraded performance or potential denial-of-service (DoS) conditions due to high computational overhead during parsing.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `markdown2` library to the patch version.
